attributes.action: Press The BBC Five Live Team  to reinstate Luke Harveys Racing Bulletin ON Their Breakfast Show
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Luke Harvey and The Racing Bulletin Has been pulled from Five Lives Breakfast Programme. The Horseracing Industry in the UK is a Multi Billion Pound Industry and This Just Shows the BBC's Contempt for The Industry.
I ask the Prime Minister to Lobby the BBC on this Petitions Behalf

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
